Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.swing

Contains extra Java Swing functionality and ease-of-use for user interfaces.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColoredSliderUI
    Extension of the basic slider UI to allow for colored thumbs.
    ColorIcon
    A single-color-filled ImageIcon
    ColormapInterpreter  
    ColormapInterpreter.Color
    helper class for the definition of a color.
    ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions
    Helper class used to communicate the minimum and maximum values of a dataset.
    CustomJSlider
    A JSlider customization that allows us to click the track and jump to that position.
    GoggleSwing
    Utility class for various static Swing components, for use in GUIs.
    GoggleSwing.ButtonBoxItem
    A single item for a ButtonBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.buttonBox()
    GoggleSwing.CheckBoxItem
    A single item for a CheckBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.checkboxBox()
    GoggleSwing.ColoredCheckBoxItem
    A single item for a LegendBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.legendBox()
    GoggleSwing.DropdownBoxesBoxItem
    A single item for a DropdownBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.dropdownBox()
    GoggleSwing.DropdownBoxItem
    A single item for a DropdownBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.dropdownBox()
    GoggleSwing.RadioBoxItem
    A single item for a RadioBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.radioBox()
    ImageComboBoxRenderer
    Modifier version of the ListCellRenderer that allows for an image to be used.
    RangeSlider
    An extension of JSlider to select a range of values using two thumb controls.
    RangeSliderUI
    UI delegate for the RangeSlider component.
    SimpleImageIcon  

Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.swing Description

Contains extra Java Swing functionality and ease-of-use for user interfaces.
